name: Orb Fort (Demo)
description:
Enter the secret fort to get the stolen power orb back in this super-tight platformer with (currently) more than 150 challenging, hand-crafted screens.

This game features a lot of enemies with different abilities such as shooting lasers, guided missiles and division blasts, chasing you, spawning blasts at death or having an energy field.

Enjoyable game hazards such as enemy-spawning portals activated by a light trigger, burning falling blocks, moving platforms, conveyor belts, lasers or timed disappearing blocks.

Found a terrain chunk that does not fit with the ones surrounding it? Shoot it! It may be hidding a key (this game's collectable). Some keys are in a visible, but difficult to reach position.

Fast deaths and lightning-fast respawns will be needed to overcome the difficult challenges this game has to offer.

The controls are smooth, simple and easy to remember: dash, shoot, run and jump.

Destroy powerful and challenging bosses.

You can download the alpha at itch.io or at Steam by joining the playtest. Feel free to give feedback on a comment or on this Google form.
